comments.commentBody: So how many other Congressional Reps and Senators who are now part of the Golden Showers administration had contact with the Russians?  We want names.  This is the most corrupt thing the US has ever witnessed, far surprising the last mafioso in the White House, Tricky Dick.

“Mr. Sessions himself spoke with the Russian ambassador last year, in seeming contradiction to his testimony at his confirmation hearing.”

“I never met with any Russian officials to discuss issues of the campaign,” Mr. Sessions said. “I have no idea what this allegation is about. It is false.”

For me, it all comes down to Mr. Sessions’ integrity and character. If his words have holes in them, how can anyone ever trust what he says going forward? I mean come on, how does anyone not recall a meeting or meetings with the Ambassador of Russia? Such a meeting would most certainly be a red letter day in my datebook!

If former national security adviser, Michael T. Flynn, resigned after it was determined that he had “misled” Vice President Mike Pence about a conversation he had with the Ambassador of Russia, then why is this any different? Did he not “mislead” members at his confirmation hearing?

We’re worried about a terrorist attack from foreign entities and even looking askew at immigrants and there’s a possibility that we have people at the very top of our government who are undermining the American government with the assistance of our long-time adversary Russia!  This has to be investigated by a bipartisan independent prosecutor immediately.  There is no telling how much sensitive, secret information has been passed on to a foreign entity and it has to be stopped.  The New York Times is proving the importance of freedom of the press.  Wherever would we be without them bringing the truth to light?

Cracks are starting to show in the Repub wall. About time. This is the same gang who claim outrage, time and time again, at Pres Obama for lying about "if you like your doctor, you can keep your doctor." BTW, has anyone seen or heard from Jason Chaffetz?
Who needs leaks when you have Breadcrumbs the size of Bagels.

GCHQ, I'm all over hating on you! I see you agree such a powerful surveillance system cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands, which is why I was mad about how fat your thread is in the first place!

So, no disgrace pulling Cameron's email out of a FCPA suspect's cell phone in you custody until you could replace it when its Tempora metadata file became available. Come on, even the Russians could figure THAT one out. And that's why Mr. Jay pecked away at the Red Top's cell phone's where abouts and time line at the Inquiry. But it gave you some leverage over Murdoch, no doubt.

I mostly dislike the perversion of data, that's what worries me most, GCHQ. Crooked folks getting off with spooky intercessions like Cameron's and NewsCorp, or being made to look guilty by the insertion of vile viruses.

But in this case, a HUGE thank you for knowing when the system has become unsustainable. THANK YOU.

Israel? Didn't think we needed a heads up, or were you gonna use it for blackmail, too?
Repeating the lies and innuendo will not make it true.  Obama and the democrats are out.  No, Russia did not influence the election.  More fake news bt the NYT.

I hope these people also preserves the integrity of sources and methods, while they were so eager to screw the incoming GOP administration. We saw a lot of this petty nonsense in the Clinton-to-Bush Transition in 2001. Hopefully the FBI will not drag it's feet, and will get this out of the way quickly. The democrats have really come down to the petty to preserve a modicum of power.

We need the tax returns. Congress has the power to subpoena to obtain them. Oh, yes, and Sessions should resign. Maybe he should listen to his 1999 admonishment of Bill Clinton for dishonoring the rule of law.
Democrats are asking Sessions to recuse himself from  the Russian interference in the US internal politics? Asking? He lied under oath?! Asking? C'mon!

replies.commentBody:
Re-read Senator Franken's question "in the course of the 2016 campaign."

As the Chairman of the Senate Sub-Committee on Strategic Forces, it is inconceivable that he did not meet with Russian officials. This is especially true given the implementation of the New START Treaty during the last administration.

Of course he met with Russians. The question is in what capacity; Senator on the Armed Services Committee or campaign surrogate. If he met with the Russians in the latter capacity, then there is a case for perjury. The NYTs has a little more digging to do.

comments.commentBody:
When testifying at his Jan. 10 Judiciary Committee confirmation hearing for his appointment as Attorney General, Jeff Sessions was asked by Senator Al Franken (D-Minn.) what he would do if he learned of any evidence that anyone affiliated with the Trump campaign communicated with the Russian government in the course of the 2016 campaign.

Sessions's answer, recorded in the videotapes of the hearing that anyone can watch: "I’m not aware of any of those activities." He then continues, "I have been called a surrogate at a time or two in that campaign and I did not have communications with the Russians."

Slice it any way you wish, this amounts to a case of documented perjury by the man who is now our Attorney General.

If the shoe were on the other foot, Republicans would be chanting, "Lock him up!" I'm not a Republican. All I ask is that Jeff Sessions be forced to resign because of perjury.

Yes, it was the Russians who told Hillary's advisors not to have her campaign in Michigan and Wisconsin and Ohio and Iowa.  It was the Russians to told Beyonce to join Hillary in Philadelphia two days before the election and shake her behind like a two-bit pole dancer.  It was the Russians who told the secret service to throw Hillary in the back of the van like a sack of Ukrainian potatoes and to make sure someone was there to film it.  It was the Russians who gave Donna Brazille the debate questions who in turn gave them to Hillary so that it would be discovered, Brazille would be sacked and Hillary exposed.  It was the Russians who told the cameraman to turn the lens on Bill's deer-caught-in-the-headlights scowl exactly at the moment during the second debate that Trump introduced the bevy of women Clinton had allegedly raped and groped.  It was the Russians who faked all those phony polls that suggested Hillary would be the runaway winner so that Hillary wouldn't campaign so hard.  Darn those Russians!

What a joke. Democrats are relying on the stupidity of their audience. Remember this all started because Hillary and team decided to move a secure department server to her house. Thus, the morons on her team were negligent and did not secure the environment. Just like all of us that log onto the internet, you are aware of hacking. So you are careful what you put online. Not these idiots. Podesta uses a password of "p@ssword". When you are that stupid you will get hacked by every country, including Russia and China. This is a joke.

American heroes. The Congress is looking the other way for political reasons above Country so this is good news that the previous Administration did their job. We know know that the Trump administration is trying to influence the press to sweep investigations under the rug. I wonder why the Republicans are so afraid of a fair investigation into this?
To paraphrase the article, "Once a political hack in the United States, always a political hack in the United States!"

Russia is the George Soros issue. He could not control them like he did W .Europe and the US( who really put Obama in the presidency) so he started the Ukraine mess. Russia retaliated
and we lost a valuable ally. Now the paid off lackeys of Soros continue to preach against Russia to no avail.

Oh yes, time will tell that there is, indeed, plenty of "there" there. And that light that this sick administration thinks it sees at the end of the tunnel, well it's gaining real momentum, and it's heading right at them. Thank you to President Obama and his staff for their insight, their decisions and their trust in our Country and it's processes. It had to be extremely difficult to stand by and watch, not only the dismantling of their accomplishments, but also the committing of numerous high crimes by an incoming administration.
What else has Sessions lied about?

There's a reason Trump unexpectedly won:

It was a stolen election.

To fill a stolen seat on the Supreme Court.

Obama was such a coward that a foreign country can interfere with our election without his saying a peep to the American voter who NEEDED this information. Didnt want to seem political. Geez leak it if you have to if you cant find the resolve to do it yourself. If it was Wall Street being hacked it would have been talk of War.
How many Ukrainians you got, Sessions?  Must I go fish?

Michael Flynn lied to Pence about his contact with the Russians.
It now appears that Jeff Sessions lied under oath about meeting the Russian ambassador.
Donald Trump routinely repeats lies about everything from crowd sizes and illegal voters to margins of victory.
It seems we have a pattern developing here...
A mafia state fails everyone but the Made Men...

Watch out, when an animal is cornered it lashes out. If the Russian connection between top people and King Trump, nothing gets done without his involvement, can be confirmed then treason should be the charge. I urge caution to seek answers without all the evidence. The pressure on Congress should step up, not only from the media but by their constituents. King Trump's Court (Bannon and gang) are not mentally stable so responses from this group will not be reasonable. They are in command of too much right now. Putin showed the world how he got away with dealing with his adversaries. Fake news is now "normal" here. Watch the ball but also watch the field. Their confidence increases with each new executive order.

The FBI has set the bar far too high.

Highly suspicious terrorists roam freely, Alaskan veterans shoot up a Florida airport, and Russia is let off the hock, because Director James Comey's standards are beyond human achievement.
